hero.subtitle: We're on the mission
hero.title: To Make Every Cancer Recovery 100% Successful
hero.description: Cancer care doesn't end when treatment ends. Yet for many patients, recovery is where structure disappears. Survival rates are improving — but supportive care remains fragmented, inconsistent, or unavailable. Patients are left to manage recovery at home, while specialists lack visibility between visits. Ruby Care exists to close this gap.

whyRubyCare.title: Why Ruby Care
whyRubyCare.description: A cancer diagnosis affects every aspect of a person's life — physical, emotional, and practical. Recovery is not a single event, but a continuous process that unfolds over months and years. What breaks survivorship care today isn't expertise. It's the absence of a shared structure after treatment.

reality.title: The reality
reality.footer: Survival is improving but recovery systems are not keeping pace.

description.primary: Ruby Care is built around a single, consistent care structure that supports survivorship over time — from intake to personalized support plans and ongoing monitoring.
description.secondary: This reduces cognitive load for specialists, improves continuity of care, and helps patients feel supported rather than overwhelmed.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: Ruby Care is built by a small, focused team working closely with clinicians and patients.
team.description: We're currently working with a limited group of specialists to ensure clinical robustness before scale. If you believe survivorship deserves the same level of structure and care as treatment itself, we'd love to talk.

manifest.title: Where Care Meets Craft
manifest.description: A brief declaration of our ambition, responsibility, and how we think about building Ruby.
manifest.intro: We believe the future of healthcare lives at the intersection of real impact and thoughtful product craft.
manifest.craft: We’re not just building software. We’re shaping an experience that carries quality — carefully designed, deeply engineered, and built around what patients and specialists actually need over time.
manifest.quality: In healthcare, quality is often compromised. We don’t accept that. Especially in cancer care, where continuity, clarity, and follow-through matter.
manifest.standard: We believe patients shouldn’t feel left alone once treatment ends. And specialists shouldn’t have to rely on scattered tools, memory, or workarounds to provide ongoing support.
manifest.complexity: Healthcare is complex. Cancer care even more so. That complexity is the work. Our responsibility is to take it on — with care, clarity, and conviction.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Make Every Cancer Recovery 100% Successful
mission.description: We believe cancer recovery shouldn’t be fragmented, improvised, or left to chance. It deserves continuity, structure, and real support beyond treatment.
mission.description_old: That’s why we’re building Ruby in close collaboration with leading experts, including Dr. Markus Knott and develop the product together with oncology specialists.

howWeHelp.title: How Ruby Enables Truly Personalized Support
howWeHelp.description: A message from Ruby's founder, Lukasz.

left.title: Specialists get a shared workspace with a continuous view of the patient.
left.modalDescription: Ruby provides specialists with a shared workspace that brings patient information, follow-ups, and support plans into one continuous view over time. Instead of scattered notes, emails, and memory, everything becomes a single reference that carries forward across the care journey. AI supports structuring and drafting information, while clinical judgment and decisions always remain with you. This reduces friction before and during appointments and enables longitudinal support without standardizing or prescribing care.

right.title: Patients get a clear structure and guidance they can rely on.
right.modalDescription: Patients receive a personalized support plan that helps them understand what matters next and how to move forward over time. The plan organizes steps and provides a shared reference they can return to whenever needed. Ruby offers a safe, structured space to stay connected with their specialist and benefit from AI support in a transparent, supportive way. Clear structure helps reduce uncertainty and builds confidence throughout recovery.

structuredIntake.title: Structured Intake

plusMore.title: Plus, a lot more
